quote: You cannot say 'no' to the people you love, not often. That's the secret. And then when you do, it has to sound like a 'yes'. Or you have to make them say 'no.' You have to take time and trouble.
quote_letters: YOU CANNOT SAY NO TO THE PEOPLE YOU LOVE NOT OFTEN THATS THE SECRET AND THEN WHEN YOU DO IT HAS TO SOUND LIKE A YES OR YOU HAVE TO MAKE THEM SAY NO YOU HAVE TO TAKE TIME AND TROUBLE
